ingredientsDesc:
Reagent: 
 Buffer solution(R-1):Glycine buffer solution, Latex suspension(R-2):0.4w/v: suspension of latex particles coated with anti-human Lp(a) antibodies (rabbit).
Calibrator:
 The calibrator is a lyophilized calibrator prepared from human serum containing lipoprotein(a).
Control:
 The control is a lyophilized control prepared from human serum containing lipoprotein(a).
